task.custom_sql: select jy.jybh as jybh,jy.jyrq as jyrq ,jy.cjdjh as cjdjh,t.zppssj as zppssj,t.cjdjhwz as cjdjhwz from sysm t left join jyqk jy on t.jybh = jy.jybh and jy.jyrq=(select max(jy1.jyrq) from jyqk jy1 where jy1.cjdjh = jy.cjdjh and exists(select t2.jybh from sysm t2 where t2.jybh = jy.jybh ) ) where jy.cjdjh is not null order by jy.cjdjh
select a.cjdjh as cjdjh,a.hdgxcbzl as hdgxcbzl from hczzx a left join cbjbqk b on a.cjdjh = b.cjdjh where hhc like '海船'
select a.cjdjh as cjdjh,a.hdgxcbzl as hdgxcbzl from zzxbc a left join cbjbqk b on a.cjdjh = b.cjdjh where hhc like '海船'

select jy.jybh as jybh,jy.jyrq as jyrq ,jy.cjdjh as cjdjh,t.qzsbzl as qzsbzl,t.qzsbsl as qzsbsl,t.zdgzfh as zdgzfh from qzbc t left join jyqk jy on t.jybh = jy.jybh and jy.jyrq=(select max(jy1.jyrq) from jyqk jy1 where jy1.cjdjh = jy.cjdjh and exists(select t2.jybh from qzbc t2 where t2.jybh = jy.jybh ) ) where jy.cjdjh is not null order by jy.cjdjh
select count(dlxh) as dlxh ,cjdjh as cjdjh from pdfsdl group by cjdjh

select jy.jybh as jybh,jy.jyrq as jyrq ,jy.cjdjh as cjdjh,t.hpmc as hpmc,t.zhl as zhl,t.zhcs as zhcs from wxhwb t left join jyqk jy on t.jybh = jy.jybh and jy.jyrq=(select max(jy1.jyrq) from jyqk jy1 where jy1.cjdjh = jy.cjdjh and exists(select t2.jybh from wxhwb t2 where t2.jybh = jy.jybh ) ) where jy.cjdjh is not null order by jy.cjdjh
select jy.cjdjh as cjdjh,t.kgrq as kgrq from jzzk t left join jyqk jy on t.jybh = jy.jybh where cjdjh is not null
